channel.title: Nord Program Change Patch
channel.description: I made a patch to send program change information from Axoloti to a Nord Micro Modular: There are 99 memory spaces on the Nord. "up" advances the by one, "down" goes back one and reset sends the Nord back to patch 1. It works fine but I have a couple of queries on it: 1) What does the "c" output on logic/counter2 do and would it be of any use here? 2) Is there a way to set the ctrl/button's so they can be controlled by an external MIDI device over CC? There's no option for that on right-click. If not, then is there a MIDI controllable version of these buttons for external triggering? 3) The patch works but is this the most practical way of doing these bank changes? Axoloti noob, so just checking my approach is correct... Thanks!

item.title: Nord Program Change Patch
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

2) Replace the ctrl/button with a midi/in/cc or midi/in/cc i object, and use the trigger outlet of this object.

3) Your patch looks ok.

Read full topic

item.title: Nord Program Change Patch
item.dc:creator: @pmj Phil Julian
item.description:
@pmj wrote:

I made a patch to send program change information from Axoloti to a Nord Micro Modular:

There are 99 memory spaces on the Nord.

"up" advances the by one, "down" goes back one and reset sends the Nord back to patch 1. It works fine but I have a couple of queries on it:

1) What does the "c" output on logic/counter2 do and would it be of any use here?

2) Is there a way to set the ctrl/button's so they can be controlled by an external MIDI device over CC? There's no option for that on right-click. If not, then is there a MIDI controllable version of these buttons for external triggering?

3) The patch works but is this the most practical way of doing these bank changes? Axoloti noob, so just checking my approach is correct...

Thanks!

Read full topic
